text:
Claremont Park (Bronx): The Zboroski Mansion, built in 1859. It is situated at the northern end of the park and is now (1940) being used as the Bronx office of the Department of Parks.

1898

Gift of Randall Comfort
title: Bronx: Claremont Park - Zboroski Mansion.

text:
Men waiting at Claremont Park to be assigned to various parks.

5-20-31

Photo by Mr. A. Tennyson Beals
Emergency Work Bureau
1931
title: Bronx: Claremont Park.
